data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo, has blown to start the match.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 4, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of America.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo blows against Guadalajara's Angel Zaldivar for offside.
Giovani Dos Santos for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
In Zapopan America drive forward through Sebastian Cordova. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 14, Free kick America.
America's Santiago Caseres gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 16, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Can Guadalajara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
America have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 18, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a America throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
America to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Throw-in for America in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Guadalajara throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 31, Giovani Dos Santos of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
At Estadio Akron, Santiago Caseres has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Henry Martin for America drives towards goal at Estadio Akron. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to America.
America to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 39, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America.
Free kick for America in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards America a goal kick.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 45, Free kick for America in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Akron.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sebastian Cordova gets his shot on target but fails to score for America.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 51, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
America drives forward and Giovani Dos Santos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jorge Sanchez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 53, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Angel Zaldivar with Oribe Peralta.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of America.
Cristian Calderon is on a sub for Fernando Beltran for Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Akron. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for America at Estadio Akron.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara drive upfield and Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a America defender.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 62, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Guadalajara, close to America's area.
In Zapopan Guadalajara attack through Jesus Sanchez. The finish is off target, however.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 63, America make their first substitution with Federico Vinas replacing Giovani Dos Santos.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 65, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Miguel Ponce breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 69, America have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Ruben Gonzalez is replacing Santiago Caseres for America at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of America.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Alan Torres is replacing Jesus Angulo for the home team.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Akron with Nicolas Benedetti replacing Henry Martin.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 79, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oribe Peralta for Guadalajara has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
Cristian Calderon is on target to give Guadalajara a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Alonso Escoboza with Andres Ibarguen. This is the fourth substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
Paul Aguilar is on a sub for Luis Fuentes for America.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 84, Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a fourth substitution, with Antonio Briseno replacing Uriel Antuna.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards America a goal kick.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
America will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Guadalajara.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
America needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
America have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Free kick America.
America's Sebastian Cordova is whistled for offside at Estadio Akron.
That's full-time at Estadio Akron. The final score is 1-0.
America's Andres Ibarguen has been booked in Zapopan.
